item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Buffalo Wild Wings

Buffalo Wild Wings is a Sports Bar in Downtown New Haven.  There are plenty of large screens to watch games while the rest of us Socialize (gasp!) in the large spacious areas around the bar.  I have not had their wings in a while, but they do have a large selection of various sauces if that's your type of thing.

Their usual Happy Hour Specials run until 7pm.

Please RSVP; for Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

HOST: Jason.  Cell # is in RSVP (texting is fine)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and/or we're most likely one of the largest groups at the Bar on a Monday (at least in the early going).
